page.title: 13EDUCATION 1
page.content: Education is compulsory for all children from 5 to 16 years,it is co-educational and is organised on the following lines,ie infant/primary, secondary.Children from this area have to attend Gamston C of E School, which is very old and in need of replacement They start in the infant section during the term in which they are five and progress into or through the primary stage which they leave at 11+, no selective examinations take place at this stage.Transfer to secondary education is in September and the school allocated for children from this area is King Edward X1,Retford. For those parents who prefer to pay extra for their childs education, excellent provision is to be found for the 4-13 year age group at Bramcote Prep. School,Gamston,and Lorne House.
